Package com.n2nlab.ruby

Class RubyEndpoint

java.lang.Object
org.apache.camel.support.service.BaseService
org.apache.camel.support.service.ServiceSupport
org.apache.camel.support.DefaultEndpoint
com.n2nlab.ruby.RubyEndpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, org.apache.camel.CamelContextAware, org.apache.camel.ComponentAware, org.apache.camel.Endpoint, org.apache.camel.IsSingleton, org.apache.camel.Service, org.apache.camel.ShutdownableService, org.apache.camel.spi.HasCamelContext, org.apache.camel.spi.HasId, org.apache.camel.StatefulService, org.apache.camel.SuspendableService
@UriEndpoint(firstVersion="1.0.0", scheme="ruby", title="Ruby Script", syntax="ruby:scriptName", category={TRANSFORMATION,SCRIPT}) public class RubyEndpoint extends org.apache.camel.support.DefaultEndpoint
Ruby endpoint for executing Ruby scripts in Camel routes. Supports both inline scripts and external script files.
